Text: It's so much easier as an iso. I have no clue what to do with it in wbfs format.

@Holy0 dude, it's much easier in wbfs. all anyone has to do is move it into their hdd and done! (if ur using gxusbloader or wiiflow) but if u need the iso cuz ur hdd is in wbfs format or to burn on disc for neogamma, then u are already doing 10x the work it takes to revert back to iso
